citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 PM on
01-NOV-16. The Director stated that he and the animal care supervisor were both currently involved in a prior
commitment and would not be available to do a facility inspection.
* A copy of the inspection report was sent by regular mail.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30 PM on
01-NOV-16.  The Director stated that he and the animal care supervisor were both currently involved in a prior
commitment and would not be available to do a facility inspection.  
*  A copy of  the inspection report was sent by regular mail.
